author: preslyel

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body: Get-WMIObject is not present in PowerShell Core. You can use Get-CimClass cmdlet.

comments.author: preslyel
comments.body: Thanks, it works fine for me

comments.author: frinck
comments.body: can core version works on get-wmiobject?

comments.author: iSazonov
comments.body:
> can core version works on get-wmiobject?

No, you should use CIM cmdlets.

title: Command was found in the module, but the module could not be loaded
